fields.name: FL1_280
fields.title: Aerosol fluorescent signal excited at 280 nm and detected at 310 nm – 400 nm
fields.description: aerosol fluorescent signal measured by WIBS, when particle is excited by 280 nm Xenon light source and detected in the waveband of 310 nm – 400 nm [-]

fields.name: FL2_280
fields.title: Aerosol fluorescent signal excited at 280 nm and detected at 420 nm – 650 nm
fields.description: aerosol fluorescent signal measured by WIBS, when particle is excited by 280 nm Xenon light source and detected in the waveband of 420 nm – 650 nm [-]

fields.name: FL2_370
fields.title: Aerosol fluorescent signal excited at 370 nm and detected at 420 nm – 650 nm
fields.description: aerosol fluorescent signal measured by WIBS, when particle is excited by 370 nm Xenon light source and detected in the waveband of 420 nm – 650 nm [-]

fields.name: Size
fields.title: Optical diameter of single particle
fields.description: optical diameter of single particle measured by WIBS [μm]

fields.name: Pwr_280
fields.title: Power of 280 nm Xenon light source
fields.description: power of the 280 nm Xenon light source [-]

fields.name: Pwr_370
fields.title: Power of 370 nm Xenon light source
fields.description: power of the 370 nm Xenon light source [-]

fields.name: FT
fields.title: Forced triggering measurement flag
fields.description: flags for periods when WIBS conducted forced triggering measurements. The values of 2 in this column corresponds to actual instrument measurements, while the value of 3 corresponds forced triggering periods [-]

fields.name: MPC
fields.title: Missing aerosol particle counts
fields.description: number of missing aerosol particle counts between two consecutive Xenon flash lamp activations [-]
